name: Monsters and Medicine
description: Monsters and Medicine is a turn-based puzzle game where adaptation is key; players try to build and expand their own hospital while injured monsters are knocking at the door, wanting treatment.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 Processor: Dual Core 2 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
